channel.title: Troy Kotsur on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Troy Kotsur on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Black Rabbit’ Review: Jude Law and Jason Bateman Lead Netflix’s Blandly Bleak Antihero Drama
item.description: Mix ‘The Bear,’ ‘Uncut Gems’ and a lot of ‘Ozark’ and you get this eight-part limited series about two bumbling brothers trying to set things right in Brooklyn.
